title: Stylish Self-Contained Apartments Close to Sydney CBD with Heated Mineral Pool & Sauna
description:
In the heart of Chatswood's entertainment district, make this urban hideaway your home away from home just 20 minutes from the Sydney CBD. Equipped with everything you could need, these self-contained apartments offer the perfect blend of modern flair and homely comforts, each featuring private balconies and fully-equipped kitchens.

For an added touch of indulgence, enjoy the hotel's heated pool, sauna, and fitness centre, ideal for unwinding or staying active during your stay. Then, venture out to Westfield Chatswood right at your doorstep for some shopping, or catch a theatre show at the Chatswood Concourse.
offer_address: 37 Victor Street, Chatswood, New South Wales 2067, Australia
